sentences.sContent: In Spain and Portugal there has been a decrease in the number of young people out of work.
sentences.sCn: 在西班牙和葡萄牙，失业青年人数已经有所下降。

sentences.sContent: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.sCn: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

remMethod.val: de(相反)+cre(增长， 产生)+ase→与增长相反的是减少→减少， 减小

trans.tranOther: the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less
to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
